content.question: Consumer surplus exists because of the

choices.label: surplus of money that wealthy consumers hold
surplus in marginal product that firms get when they hire an additional worker
willingness of some consumers to pay a price higher than the market price for some units of a good
additional utility that households obtain when the prices of substitutes fall
increase in the availability of goods when income rises

content.answer: willingness of some consumers to pay a price higher than the market price for some units of a good

topic.text: 2.6: Market Equilibrium and Consumer and Producer Surplus

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
